attributes.action: Criminalise UK nationals acting against the best interests of core UK industry
attributes.additional_details: The general public see treason from political figures.  It is not called treason due to the punishment that would bring but the fact that our industries have been sold to foreign countries against our best interests in order to make money is treason.  Anyone acting against the Crown, the State or the people of the United Kingdom is guilty of treason.  This is undeniable and is not being enforced and the terms are not being dealt i.e. life jail sentence.
attributes.background: To ensure that any person who is a UK national, and especially an elected official, has a duty of care to the UK and all its populace.  Under terms to be agreed, anyone knowingly acting against the interests of the UK will be tried under the grounds of treason.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
